properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 11:03AM EST until February 16 at 7:26AM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Charleston WV has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...Kentucky...

Ohio River At Greenup Lock affecting Greenup and Scioto Counties.

...The National Weather Service in Charleston WV has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...Kentucky...West
Virginia...

Ohio River At Huntington affecting Wayne, Cabell, Boyd and
Lawrence Counties.

For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast.

The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River At Greenup Lock.
* From Friday morning to Sunday morning.
* At 10:45 AM EST Thursday the stage was 52.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 54.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a
maximum value of 55.2 feet early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 56.0 feet, Several low lying areas are flooded and
backwater affects both sides of the river.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 55.3
feet on 01/22/1996.
properties.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Please report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by
calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. You may
also report severe weather by posting your report to the Charleston
West Virginia National Weather Service Facebook Page, or by using
the Twitter Hashtag, NWSRLX.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.

The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EST or
sooner if necessary.
